AboutUsResponseBody.description: Response body for about us block

description.example: in car rentals highlights a steadfast commitment to excellence, marked by a track record of trust and satisfaction among thousands of clients worldwide

BookCarResponseBody.description: Response object for booking a car

message.example:
New booking was successfully created. 
Audi A6 Quattro 2023 is booked for Nov 11 - Nov 16 
You can change booking details until 10:30 PM 10 Nov.
Your order: #2437 (08.06.24)

text.example: I rented a car for a week. The car was in good condition, the service was excellent. I am very satisfied with the service!

ClientReviewSortedPageableResponseBody.description: Payload for response with sorted pageable list of client reviews

CreateFeedbackRequestBody.description: The request body for the create Feedback operation

feedbackText.example: I rented a car for a week. The car was in good condition, the service was excellent. I am very satisfied with the service!

CreateFeedbackResponseBody.description: The response body for the createFeedback operation

systemMessage.description: The system message about feedback creation

ExportReportResponseBody.description: The response body for the export report operation

answer.example: To rent a car, you will need a valid driver's license, a credit card in your name, and a government-issued photo ID (such as a passport or national ID). International renters may also need to present an International Driving Permit (IDP) in addition to their home country driver’s license.

question.example: What documents do I need to rent a car?

feedbackText.example: I am very satisfied with the service!
